backend/main.mo: Actor defining customer, sales, and cash‑register types plus CRUD and authorization‑guarded operations with in‑memory Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing many frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing page navigation and rendering pages including new Sales History.
frontend/src/backend/mappers.ts: Utility mappers converting frontend models to backend types and vice versa, including payment, sale, customer, and session mappings.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/CashC: Panel that summarizes current cash session totals and payment breakdown and triggers closing the register.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/CashO: Panel to open a cash register session by entering an initial float and handling open state.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/Closi: Displays a sorted list of past cash register closings with totals and payment method breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/repor: Provides functions to calculate payment breakdowns from sales and filter sales by session.
frontend/src/features/customers/Customer: Shows customer info, raffle eligibility, and purchase history with detailed sale item breakdowns.
Dialog form for creating or editing customers, managing name and phone fields.
Table listing customers with actions to view, edit, or delete each entry.
frontend/src/features/inventory/ProductF: Search and category filter controls for filtering products in the inventory view.
Form dialog for creating or editing products with fields for details and image upload.
frontend/src/features/inventory/ProductT: Displays a table of products with images, stock warnings, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/features/pos/CartPanel.tsx: Shows cart items with quantity controls, subtotal per item, and total summary.
frontend/src/features/pos/cartTypes.ts: Defines cart item types and helpers for computing subtotals and sale item mappings.
Handles payment selection, cash validation, change calculation, and finalizing checkout.
frontend/src/features/pos/CustomerSelect: Dropdown component for optionally linking a customer to a sale.
frontend/src/features/pos/payment.ts: Provides payment method list and helpers for validating cash payments and calculating change.
Product search and filter UI allowing users to browse and add products to the cart.
frontend/src/features/pos/RaffleEligibil: Displays an alert when the sale total qualifies for a raffle entry.
frontend/src/features/pos/useCart.ts: React hook managing cart items, stock validation, and totals with add, update, remove, and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppStore.ts: Zustand store handling products, customers, sales, and cash sessions with localStorage persistence and update helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend customers, sales, cash sessions, and mutations using actor and data mappers.
frontend/src/i18n/ptBR.ts: Portuguese localization strings and functions for UI labels, errors, and messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and accessibility-focused defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CashRegisterPage.tsx: Manages cash register sessions, syncing backend data, opening/closing sessions, and displaying history.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Provides customer listing, creation, editing, and viewing, with dialogs and basic error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders a dashboard with navigation cards linking to major app sections.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Displays and filters products, and handles creation, editing, and deletion via dialogs and store actions.
frontend/src/pages/PosPage.tsx: Implements POS flow including cart management, customer selection, and recording sales to backend.
frontend/src/pages/SalesHistoryPage.tsx: Shows a collapsible list of past sales with customer names, payment info, and totals.
frontend/src/storage/localStorageStore.t: Loads, saves, and clears persistent app state in localStorage with versioning.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for products, customers, sales, cash sessions, and app state.
frontend/src/utils/image.ts: Provides a function to validate and convert images to base64 with a 500KB size limit.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Contains helpers to format numbers as BRL currency and parse currency strings to numbers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, and pending requests related to adding a sales history screen.
